DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , Phase I study evaluate safety , efficacy , pharmacokinetics atezolizumab alone combination daratumumab and/or various immunomodulatory agent participant MM relapse undergone autologous stem cell transplantation ( ASCT ) . The planned duration study approximately 36 month . Cycle length 21 day Cohorts A C 28 day Cohorts D F .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Atezolizumab ( Anti-Programmed Death-Ligand 1 PD-L1 Antibody ) Alone Combination With Immunomodulatory Drug and/or Daratumumab Participants With Multiple Myeloma ( MM )
